column4: Provided that the time included between the first and

column3: last of such dates shall not exceed one year.

column4: (3) When the nature of the case is such that the particulars
mentioned  in  section  164  and  the  preceding subsections  of
this  section  do  not  give  the  accused  sufficient  notice  of  the
is  charged,  the  charge  shall  also
contain such particulars of the manner in which the alleged
offence was committed as will be sufficient for that purpose.
